fields.name: Quack Medicine:
fields.value: If your standard deviation is greater than your target's, you will reduce their defense power by 0.2x tonight. If your standard deviation is less than or equal to your target's, you will increase their defense power by 1.0x tonight. This ability may not self-target.

fields.name: Let's Try Something I Saw Online (Charge 110%):
fields.value: Increase your target's defense power by 2.0x tonight, but decrease it by 0.5x the following night. Note: the decrease the following night can be prevented by neither death nor roleblock.

fields.name: Overbooked (Unlocked, Passive):
fields.value: You may perform two actions each night. This passive becomes locked if one of your targets dies on a night you adjust their defense power.

fields.name: License Inquiry (Passive):
fields.value: If you are visited by a Town Investigative player, you will self-roleblock.
